user.title: Log in to Vibbo
user.description: You will receive an SMS with a one-time code to verify your identity.

data_description.phone_number: The mobile number linked to your Vibbo/OBOS account.

verify_code.title: Verify your phone
verify_code.description: A one-time code has been sent to **{phone_number}**. It may take a few seconds to arrive.

data_description.verification_code: The 4-digit code you received by SMS.

select_organization.title: Choose your borettslag
select_organization.description: You are a member of multiple housing cooperatives. Pick the one you want to add.

options.title: Refresh interval
options.description: How often should the feed be updated? A lower value means more frequent updates but may cause rate-limiting.

error.auth_error: Could not start login. Please check your phone number and try again.
error.invalid_code: The verification code is incorrect. Please try again.
error.cannot_connect: Could not connect to Vibbo. Please try again later.

data_description.scan_interval: How often the feed is refreshed. Minimum 5 minutes, recommended 30.
